mapper.select: SELECT member_email AS memberEmail, member_pw AS memberPw FROM market_member WHERE member_email =#{memberEmail} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_no, member_nickname, member_pw, member_phone, member_email, member_date ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{memberNickname}, PASSWORD(#{memberPw}), #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO member_pic ( member_no, member_pic_name, member_pic_size, member_pic_ext ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{memberPicName}, #{memberPicSize}, #{memberPicExt} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_email FROM ( SELECT member_email FROM member UNION SELECT member_email FROM backup )t WHERE member_email=#{memberIdCk}
